message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my best offer, as I know I can find other interested buyers at this price point.
I'm still interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $16,000?
